Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to the installation and maintenance of newsstands pursuant to a franchise and the placement of advertising on newsstands and to repeal subdivision d, and to repeal and reenact subdivision h, of section 20-231 of such code.
Items.MatterName: Installation and maintenance of newsstands pursuant to a franchise and the placement of advertising on newsstands.

Items.Title: Application no. 20045196 TCQ, pursuant to §20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of Emel Soan Corp., d/b/a Athens Café, to continue to maintain and operate an unenclosed sidewalk café located at 32-07 30th Avenue, Borough of Queens, Council District no. 22.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.
Items.MatterName: Sidewalk Cafe, Athens Cafe 32-07 30th Ave, Queens (20045196TCQ)

Items.Title: Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. 030436 ZMM, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning changes to the zoning map, Borough of Manhattan, Council District nos. 7 and 9.
Items.MatterName: ULURP, Frederick Douglass Blvd. Rezoning, Manhattan (030436ZMM)

Items.Title: Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. 030436 ZMM, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning changes to the zoning map, Borough of Manhattan, Council District nos. 7 and 9.
Items.MatterName: ULURP, Frederick Douglass Blvd. Rezoning, Manhattan (030436ZMM)
